name: flynn
text: I too have azn peeps and Pat's attitude is not appreciated.

name: catachresis
text: Strips about anally retentive forum moderators: awesome

name: soticoto
text: Forums with a Pat in charge are a disturbingly common thing.

name: catachresis
text:
Four edits, two in the same minute
There is so much about this strip that is good

name: choosebro
text: And you know that one of those edits was just to capitalise those words.

name: iidebaser
text: the edits are really what make the strip, for me.

name: stuart
text: What's sad is this srtip more than anything aligns me with Pat

name: stuart
text: for instance I would be editing that typo right now

name: zem
text: man Pat is born to be a regular contributor to wikipedia

name: wae
text: The wikipedia promise: "People who edit online encyclopedias in their spare time generally agree that . . ."

name: atmus
text: A comment left by atmus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, dismas, al_batross, theplaidknight, Satyr)

name: mrectomy
text: my first chubby.

name: envika
text: heh

name: chaesar
text:
Pat is really coming into his own in this strip. Maybe he was always a pretty chill guy, but after the hat incident and trying to run a small business killed his kindness.

So I guess if you are Subway admin, your status is "Jared"

name: spinynorman
text: It was about this time that he lost the dialect similarities with Ray and Beef. No more "runnin'" and "yellin'" and all that. Once his asshole got clenched to pinhole status I bet he started not only keeping those extra letters but adding letters and grammatical layers just so his sentences would be that much better. Not to mention correct.

name: biznart
text: Unless Rod is doing all the catching, I'd wager Pat's pinhole status has been revoked.

name: rmj12345
text: A comment left by rmj12345 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by chochacho, GeyserShitdick, m1st3rbl4ck)

name: nurdbot
text: I'm amazed Pat almost has a thousand posts. How much can one talk about the quality of toasted subs?

name: cdtm
text: That's part of the beauty.  Believe it or not, it happens..  a LOT.

name: philosophe
text: Have you ever seen the Mr. Clean forum? Oh god.

name: tekende
text: BOO TO THAT

name: leftsaidtim
text: Why bother?

name: deovalente
text: Not only almost 1000 posts, but he registered only a month earlier.

name: yomimono
text: At least 700 of those posts are snippy e-mails reminding people about the extremely restrictive rules of the forum.

name: yomimono
text: Huh.  "Snippy e-mails" has become a collocation for me.  Fuck work.

name: rad_chillies
text: Haha Onstad nailed dicky people on message boards with this.  CAPITALIZING words for emphasis is just perfect.   I also really love Vlad's tone when he bitches pat out.  hella taco bell stylezzzz

name: m3funkyb
text: white computer vs black computer, RIDICULOUS claim

name: riazm
text: Pat drafts out his forum replies in Vim before pasting them into his browser.

name: stuart
text: Chubby because Pat is EXACTLY the kind of asshole who would use Vim.

name: riazm
text: Thanks for the chubby. I've been thinking of learning some Vim lately. The yin to my emacs yang.

name: stuart
text: I wasn't aware until recently that Pat's use of Unix command line apps for things was a canonically established trait.

name: rowboat
text: Ya'll some nerds.

name: riazm
text:
Rowboat I would like to offer the following rebuttal to your RIDICULOUS claims:

Me and stuart are having a perfectly reasonable conversation about archaic text editors which any right thinking members of society would IMMEDIATELY realise are superior to the bloated, resource nightmare that modern gui editors are.

I'm not going to place you on my ignore list right now though it would be COMPLETELY within my rights to do so.

[Post rewritten twice because I accidentally pressed Ctrl-Z and paused emacs and forgot the command to restart it]

name: rowboat
text: I'm just sayin' ....

name: leftsaidtim
text:
character encodings hella stale...
all gotta payz dolla$$ for shortcuts...
riazm why you put doo in the text editor?

name: yomimono
text: Oh what.  Pat is a total Emacs dude, all having eight hundred Ctrl-Shift-Meta-Alt-Q type things set up to automatically block people, except he has written them wrong because he doesn't really know Lisp despite constantly telling Beef how superior it is.

name: estutius
text: As a former sandwich artist, I can say to with certainty that we indeed put doo in the meatballs.

name: featurelessvoid
text: Well, as long as it was done it at strictly regulated temperatures...

name: shirt145
text: Yes, isn't it nice how Ray never actually rebuts that particular claim? Doo is okay as long as the temperature dial is set to MAXIMUM SAFETY.

name: theguitarhero
text: I think you mean Pat.

name: shirt145
text: Why yes, yes I do.  Or do I?  (Yeah I pretty much do.)

name: theguitarhero
text: I like to imagine T-rex saying this.

name: mattylite
text: As a former sandwich, I can't really talk.  Even when I was a current sandwich, I couldn't talk.

name: layzerblade
text: Everyone contains a couple thousand former sandwiches.

name: songbirdspectre
text: Pat has Jared Status. That is serious.

name: cousinted
text: Look at Pat in that first panel: guy's so angry he is ready to strangle someone through the computer.

name: caseyb3
text: Hella Taco Bell stylezz

name: tekende
text:
I like how Pat's defense to the meatball statement does not actually contradict Vlad's accusation.

Also, Pat doesn't hate all Asians, just Asian barbers.

name: boogers
text: it's 5:40 in the morning and i'm waking all my roommates up because i cannot stop giggling about this. the giggling will not cease.

name: drskradley
text: Vlad, you scoundrel !

name: cycerin
text: I was smiling all along as i read downwards, but I burst out laughing first when I saw the excess of edit lines

name: waddlerz
text: Read the Capitalized font on Pat's first note:  EVERYONE'S OUTRAGEOUS!  Clearly he does hate his customers

name: snowman
text: man that's kind of a stretch

name: charchar
text: They sayy sll toppings are free: so, could I get like an entire sandwich for free if I asked it to be put on my first sandwich? Like, A sub^2? Then, the Hot-Pocket Hot Pocket.

name: charchar
text: They say all... D is for Lysdexia!

name: radarjammer
text: This strip really shows how pointless it is to argue with people on the internet.

name: leftsaidtim
text: I disagree.

name: daidai
text: And so, Gladi8orrex was born.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Vlad is a fucking genius. I swear he could teach at a school for those deficient in the asshole reflex. But he would do it with panache.
